---
title: "TDF2024"
output: html_document
date: "2024-04-20"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

require(tidyverse)

TDF2024 = read_csv('outputs/brute_force_2/tabulated_accuracy.csv') %>% 
  glimpse() %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = train:holdout, names_to = "variable", values_to = "accuracy") %>% 
  glimpse()
   
grand_mean = TDF2024 %>% 
  group_by(variable) %>% 
  summarise(mean_ = mean(accuracy),
            sd_ = sd(accuracy))

TDF2024 = TDF2024 %>% 
  left_join(grand_mean) %>% 
  mutate(accuracy_z = (accuracy-mean_)/sd_)

```


```{r}
TDF2024 %>% 
  filter(hidden %in% c(20, 100)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(factor(hidden), accuracy_z)) +
  geom_violin() +
  facet_wrap(vars(variable))


```

## Min max differences

```{r}

TDF2024 %>% 
  filter(hidden %in% c(20, 100)) %>% 
  group_by(variable, hidden) %>% 
  summarise(min_ = min(accuracy_z),
            max_ = max(accuracy_z)) %>% 
  mutate(accuracy_z_difference = min_ - max_)


```
